attributes.action: Stop giving handouts to "low-income" citizens and start rewarding hard working citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The simple equation is less work = more benefits funded by hardworking, taxpaying citizens. This is not a communist country, and hard work should be rewarded, and free handouts to immigrants and low income households should not be the norm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
